text: Leptadapis is a genus of adapiform primate that lived in Europe during the middle Eocene. Fossils of the genus have been found in the Escanilla Formation of Spain and Egerkingen in Switzerland.Leptadapis at Fossilworks.org L. magnus skull == References == === Bibliography === * Category:Prehistoric strepsirrhines Category:Prehistoric primate genera Category:Eocene primates Category:Bartonian life Category:Eocene mammals of Europe Category:Paleogene Spain Category:Fossils of Spain Category:Paleogene Switzerland Category:Fossils of Switzerland Category:Fossil taxa described in 1876
title: Leptadapis
